title: La Feria and Eat Green
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant with store, in Playas del Coco. Kitchen uses seasonal produce to make the dishes, and dinner menu reported will include a couple vegan suitable entrees and appetizers. Store accepts weekly orders for organic produce and pantry items like oil, vinegar, wine, kombucha, grains, herbs, bread - email your order by Thursday and arrange for delivery or pick up Saturday or Sunday.
streetAddress: main boulevard in Playas De Coco
